discover.title: Discover

filters.title: Filters
filters.dealbreakersInfo: Gender, children, and relationship preferences from your profile are automatically used as dealbreakers to find compatible matches.

filters.upgradePremium: Upgrade to Premium for Advanced Filters

onboarding.ethnicityHelp: This helps find cultural connections. You can hide this later in settings.

matchingPreferences.title: Matching Preferences
matchingPreferences.coreDealbreakersBannerDesc: These preferences automatically filter your matches to find the most compatible partners.

matchingPreferences.ageRangeDesc: Show matches in this age range
matchingPreferences.willingToRelocateDesc: Consider matches outside your max distance
matchingPreferences.preferencesUpdated: Your matching preferences have been updated! Your discover feed will refresh.

reviews.mutualRevealInfo: Reviews will be revealed when both parties submit or after 3 days
reviews.disclaimer: Reviews are anonymous and will only be visible after both parties review or the window expires.
reviews.reviewSubmittedAndRevealed: Review submitted and revealed! Both parties have reviewed.
reviews.reviewSubmittedPending: Review submitted! It will be revealed when the other party reviews or after 3 days.
reviews.submitError: Failed to submit review. Please try again.
reviews.matchToSeeDetails: Match with this person to see detailed reviews
reviews.bothSubmitted: Both reviews submitted! Reviews will be revealed soon.
reviews.waitingForOther: You've submitted your review. Waiting for the other party.
reviews.notEnoughReviewsDesc: You have {{count}} reviews. You need at least {{required}} reviews before your rating is shown publicly.
reviews.noReviewsDesc: Reviews from your matches will appear here after they're revealed.
reviews.autoDisabledDesc: Reviews have been automatically disabled for your safety based on your location.
reviews.showAggregatePubliclyDesc: Let everyone see your star rating before matching
reviews.showDetailedAfterMatchDesc: Show category breakdown to people you match with
reviews.allowNewReviewsDesc: Let matches review you after 7 days
reviews.settingsInfo: Changes to these settings will take effect immediately and update how your reviews are displayed.
reviews.saveError: Failed to save settings. Please try again.
